outputs.output_descr:
Undertaking analysis, interagency coordination, and public participation activities directed at enabling the implementation of the Strategic Approach by integrating  i.e. mainstreaming  the sound management of chemicals in national strategies, and thereby informing development assistance cooperation priorities
Development and strengthening of national chemicals management institutions, plans, programmes and activities to implement the Strategic Approach.

project_descr: Suriname /UNEP /UNDP partnership for the integration of sound management of chemicals into development planning and processes
project_title: sound management of chemicals into development planning
